Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in town if you look for a cheap, clean and central hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Alexander F
Reviews.Content: We stayed over eastern in this hotel and we picked it do to his recommendations in tripadvisor. The hotel is very central located near the highway to the LA beaches, Universal Studios, LA downtown, Hollywood, Beverly Hills etc... The hotel is very cheap, the rooms are in good shape with a big bathroom and very clean and not noisy. The manager is very helpful in everything you asked him for (he received some parcels for me which my friend had sent for me to the hotel) and near the hotel there are a lot of choices for breakfest, lunch and dinner. In total it was a perfect stay in LA and when we will come to LA again surely we will stay again in this hotel. Saludos

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: April K
Reviews.Content: The hotel was really clean and comfortable. There are many restaurants around the hotel. The metro is not far away. I really liked the shower in the room. The only thing I didnÂ´t like was the smell from the AC.

Reviews.Title: “Modern clean and comfy”
Reviews.Author: eeschaub
Reviews.Content: I've had the best experience staying here the rooms are so clean the service is excellent! Patel the manager has really made our stay very pleasant. We will be staying here every time we are in town. The staff really makes u feel at home and the service is exceptional. Thanks Patel and rodeway inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Chanel S
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were a bit skeptical of this place but soon changed for the better! The customer service was great here! The hotel looked as if it had been recently renovated, very clean inside! Overall, our experience here was great! We had a late night and had asked to extend our check-out time but was told that the room had already been booked by another party at noon. He was so nice about it and kept apologizing. So nice! Would recommend this place to anyone although not in the best area.

Reviews.Title: “clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: homi77
Reviews.Content: easy access to major road and nice staff. Coffee is always ready at front 24hr. Just to sleep at a hotel, this is your choice. MacDnonald, Panda Express, Jack in the Box, Seven eleven etc within walking distance. Good neighborhood, too. just one thing, loud AC when it's on...

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly comfortable and clean”
Reviews.Author: Lauraleeb76
Reviews.Content: When I booked this hotel for a recent trip to San Pedro I was cautious at best. I travel extensively for work and regularly stay at mid to high level hotel chains. I was admittedly watching our money on this trip. The bathroom had recently been remodeled and was as nice as many high end hotels I have visited. The beds were comfortable and the room was large enough. The best part was how clean the room was. It is always a risk when you chose to go for affordable lodging. This was a functional, well located and extremely clean hotel. I highly recommend staying here if you are traveling on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Very enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: J G
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with this accommodation. The manager was nice and helpful. He didn't even get upset with me when I locked myself out of my room late at night! Facilities clean, bed was comfortable, easy parking, quiet, wifi worked great. Would highly recommend it. The only disappointment was the "free breakfast" was only coffee. I never expect much from free breakfast but even some toast would have been nice. But don't let that stop you staying here. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and solid”
Reviews.Author: kanufreundwi
Reviews.Content: The motel is cheap with good infrastructure and a helpful management. Bathrooms new and the rooms in general very clean and the service okay. A good and worth the price motel including gratis parking. There is no breakfast except coffee included but there are good facilitis for breakfast nearby...................................

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, great value”
Reviews.Author: Ken F
Reviews.Content: My daughter and i spent a week in the area the second week of January. This hotel is clean, the staff are friendly and the location is close to freeways for quick access in any direction. The hotel had many guests yet was quiet while we were there, you can hear road noise in the morning but nothing out of the ordinary. Although we did not walk anywhere in the neighborhood, it seemed quiet and safe and many restaurants and amenities are close.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, nice hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: joebizzy21
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed my stay here. The staff was willing to do anything to my stay better. For a 2 star hotel it is a nice hotel.10 minute drive to the beach and several things to do in the area. I would recommend, if you are in the area and looking for great value.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the price”
Reviews.Author: edwat
Reviews.Content: Clean well maintained and courteous staff. Across the street and down the block is a great little Mom & Pop Breakfast Diner and next to that a Barbershop with great razor cut haircuts and low prices.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and gentle staff”
Reviews.Author: Luiz M
Reviews.Content: Good choice at the Harbor City area. Staff was very gentle and the manager gave us great assistance. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Good price!

Reviews.Title: “APPEARS KINDA PLAIN JANE, BUT IT IS MORE!”
Reviews.Author: ijustknow29
Reviews.Content: I've got to say, sometimes I think I live on a different planet. I found this place very pleasant. I had none of the unpleasant experiences a few other reviewers did. Or maybe it's improved a lot since then. I needed to be in Long Beach @ 2PM for my check-in to my overnight yacht stay. I have a terrible time getting out of my house. so stayng someplace nearby LB with an 11AM check out time is the best way for me. I used my Choice Hotels website and located this little hideout which is actually in Harbor City, Just south of Torrance. The in-room (meaning in the living area) jacuzzi was the selling point. I have had other Choice hotels with this option and it is a little bit of heaven. I got off the 710 Freeway @ PCH thinking I would check out the dining/shopping options along the way. This is an area around the Port of LA so it is somewhat industrial/small town along the way. The Inn itself is in a nice enough area (actually quieter than I thought it would be) well kept and well lit. When I walked into the room, I was taken aback a little by the sparseness. There are no bedside lamps. The trick is, all the lighting is in the ceiling. Bedside switches turn on nice overhead lighting. The electronic key card goes into a reader in the wall & accesses all lighting, you control the off/on for each light. This is great for me, because I consistently lay the key down and can never remember where I left it last. When you leave you pull the card out and a timer shuts all the lights off. When you return the key goes back into the reader and immediately you have light. Slick. The room itself was spacious enough (obviously uncluttered) and clean. After soaking myself till I was a noodle, I slipped in between the nicest, softest, crisply pressed sheets ever & crashed out. I thought I would drive into Redondo for some food & to buy a bottle of wine. Not 5-10 minutes north there is a gigantic shopping area which turned out to be Torrance. It was perfect-Trader Joe's, CVS, etc. Stopped by Macaroni Grill for some take out. Found a lively Happy Hour and ended up staying for Honor Bar Chianti & ended up eating there. Met some wonderful people and had an enjoyable visit. One of the long-time bar tenders was having a Birthday so the bar was filled with regulars & well wishers. Couldn't complain about a thing. Inn, food, shopping. Goes to show you never know what you will find when your not looking.

Reviews.Title: “Got the job done”
Reviews.Author: kilyrann
Reviews.Content: Room was small but nice & clean. Great shower, nice marble bathroom. Walls were thin...traffic outside was loud and sound of shower running in other rooms kinda shook our walls....but we still managed to sleep like rocks for two nights which was what we needed. Internet connection was rocking too, which is also a necessity for us (we travel for a living). Nice folks.

Reviews.Title: “A bit disappointed”
Reviews.Author: janda0808
Reviews.Content: We booked the motel as it has a lot of good reviews on tripadvisor, however we were a bit disappointed during our stay. First of all, the room had a distinctive urine smell that we couldn't get rid of. And the double beds were more like king singles - prior to Rodeway we had also stayed at different low budget motels/hotels in the US but the beds were all bigger. The breakfast wasn't that great, we got a danish and the coffee was.. errr.. not like coffee - but I suppose we can't really complain as the breakfast was complimentary. The worst part of our stay is that I woke up with lots of bites on my limbs on the last day. The motel manager seemed to think that it was some sort of allergy but if it was, the red dots would have covered my whole body (I only got them on fingers, arms and legs). I do have to make it clear that I don't know if this was Rodeway's fault, I mean the bugs might have been hiding in my luggage so they could be from the last hotel. The manager was concerned enough about my well-being, and advised me to get some medicine from a local pharmacy store. Good things about Rodeway. Well, it is close to a petrol station and a few fast food restaurants. It is on a big road so not hard to find (having a GPS in LA is a must). Strong fast free wi-fi. The staff are definitely very friendly and helpful. For the price we pay, this wasn't a bad choice.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, well maintained motel in an average neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: goosechase_11
Reviews.Content: All I wanted was a decent, reasonably priced hotel in the LA area for two nights just to sleep in the night. I decided to book this one after reading so many positive reviews on Trip advisor. In fact I was a bit surprised to see a Rodeway Inn to be ranked in the top 10 hotels in LA. I was very curious to see if it lived up to its high ranking. After staying, I should say that it's a very well maintained motel even if it is not located in the best part of town. It's on a industrial section of a very busy highway with a rather seedy looking hotel to one side and a strip club across the road. We felt a bit apprehensive about safety initially but no had no problems whatsoever. Parking is a bit cramped especially if you have a bigger vehicle and arrive late in the night. The room was very comfortable and all appliances lwere new. The manager was very friendly and seemed very eager to keep his guests comfortable. Breakfast is nothing to boast of - just juice/coffee and a few take away items that you would get at a gas station. Overall, I would say it is a good choice for someone looking a place to sleep and proximity to highways. But all things considered, I don't think the hotel deserves such a high ranking.

Reviews.Title: “Wont find better for that price”
Reviews.Author: Titonator
Reviews.Content: I stayed for two nights in this motel and to tell you the truth it was perfect for my kind of trip. It was my first time in L.A. And all I wanted to do in the motel was sleep, and for that it was great. The beads were realy confortable, it had a dual air conditioner and heater, wich was realy noisy, but for what I was paying I expected to freeze to death, and there is a 32' flat screen TV on each room. The owner was very polite and helpfull. If you are looking for luxury, this is not your hotel, but if you just need a good, clean place to sleep, for very little money, this motel is exactly what you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the cost/Unwarranted late night visit”
Reviews.Author: bayafy
Reviews.Content: I would give it an excellent if it was not for the encounter I had with the owner. I traveled to L.A. alone for my 40th. I stayed two nights in the room I reserved. My second night, extremely late, I was awaken out of my sleep with a knock on the door and it was a man (maybe owner) telling me I couldn't have extra people in my room. I opened the door to find him at my door and a women standing at the end of the corridor, I guess she was there for back up. Not to mention, you could clearly see that I was in PJs, with a scarf on my head, and pillow imprints on my face. He said â€œYou said it was just you.â€� I reiterated that it was just me. He actually told me I was lying. There was a group of loud people that came to the complex and when he asked what room they were going to they told him my room number. I told him that I was the only one in my room and that I didnâ€™t know what the heck he was talking about. This went on for about 5 minutes and then he gave up. Upon further inspection, it was a room two doors down. He apologized greatly in the morning when I came to check out. He offered me orange juice, which I am allergic to. The living quarters were excellent for my budget. The hotel was nice and clean. I slept comfortably outside of that very night.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect at the best value!!”
Reviews.Author: PaulinaAbarca
Reviews.Content: Everything is clean, they have a flat tv with many channels, microwave and freezer. They also have in the room a small dinner table and a desk. The bed was confortable and big. The air conditioner working really good. I recomend this hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel for low cost.”
Reviews.Author: FLOMAHA
Reviews.Content: Good location. Close to many attractions. Small average rooms but good deal for cost.

Reviews.Title: “frequent traveller”
Reviews.Author: Joseph Y
Reviews.Content: The room was very small. Not at a convenient location. The bathroom was very well done with good tile and marble. The service was very cordial and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “very happy with the stay...”
Reviews.Author: aniket p
Reviews.Content: Good decision to stay here. Pros: 1. VERY CLEAN...and thats wat is my priority to judge any accommodation. The bathroom was very clean, new and maintained well. 2. New sheets/pillow covers/bed. The place is established quite a few time back and the new stuff proves that they replace these things often. 3. Free Wifi access, sufficient speed. 4. Safe area around. Its located on PCH, with good connectivity and safe location. 5. Close to major stores, this is not that important but I think its worth to mention. 6. Complementary breakfast/coffee/juices free in the morning.(sounds like I do not have a enough experience of staying out..:-), beleive me I am very happy that I chose to stay here) Cons 1. Drinking water is not free(that was ok with me). 2. Might be a lil noisy at night since its on PCH, but its probably for very sound sensitive people.

Reviews.Title: “WORST PLACE EVER STAYED”
Reviews.Author: LIVINGlifewithGI
Reviews.Content: If you want a truck stop this is your place but as accommodation close to beaches and restaurants this is not your place we book 3 nights with this place and when we checked into it, it was not what it was made out to be, The room was basic which is fine but not closed to anything at all and after a $70 cab fare checked straight back out and went and stayed in Santa Monica which was the best decision ever made. Do not stay here unless you want a basic stay not near anything or central to anything it's not a tourist area.

Reviews.Title: “Great surprise”
Reviews.Author: lbdmt
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel this past weekend, and it was great! I booked the in-suite jacuzzi room and it was quiet, comfortable and everything I expected. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed the jacuzzi. The water was hot and the bed was oh so comfortable. I will definitely make this my hotel of choice when I need to get away. For the price, you cannot beat this hotel. The manager was friendly and accommodating. The tv was great, new stainless appliances (microwave, refrigerator). I highly recommend this place. I'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Shannon W
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with this hotel and the manager. The room was very clean and updated. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The location was central to a lot of things. The hotel was also quiet. We did like the fact that all rooms had door mats which made it feel much more homey. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.

Reviews.Title: “hard to beat in LA budget hotels”
Reviews.Author: Stefano4180
Reviews.Content: This place is all it claims to be: centrally located in LA county close to the freeway 110, close to beaches and close to plenty of groceries stores. The rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff is on the ball and made sure my stay was comfortable. Wifi was fast and reliable and the huge LCD TVs with premium channels are nice. I stayed there a week and I would do it again. Hard to beat in that price range.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: SetTraveler
Reviews.Content: For the paid money, this hotel is great. Rooms are new, very clean and have everything you need: refrigerator, microwave, tv (flat screen), desk, table, 3 chairs (this is great when you want to eat and have the family with you). Bathroom was in a very good condition. Nice and helpful staff. Location is also good. Palos Verdes area is one of the nicest I've seen on the coast. Also, LA attractions are not very far as the hotel is close to HWY 110. Nice area around and everything you need can be found in 10-15 mins. Maybe noisy for some people in the working days but not for us.

Reviews.Title: “If this is the location and price you want, then go for it!”
Reviews.Author: fleagah
Reviews.Content: Flew to LA this May with my parents for my brother's graduation. Rodeway was clean, in a nice area, and the service was fine. The location was alright for us. Although it was a little farther from the university campus than other options, it seemed safer than the hotels I'd looked at in the downtown area. If you're looking for something in the area, then this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service and top notch rooms.”
Reviews.Author: Mitski03
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this hotel is the value for money. The rooms are new with a flat screen tv, microwave and fridge freezer. There are two sinks one in the bathroom and one outside which is very convenient when staying with friends. The staff are really helpful and are always willing to help and give advice on where to go etc. The location is pretty decent in harbour city with access to long beach and the rest of LA via many roads so you can navigate the traffic using a well organised tomtom! All in all would 100% stay here again on my return visit to LA

Reviews.Title: “Clean, affordable, so-so neighborhood, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: azinca
Reviews.Content: family owned and attentive. Basic amenities, the neighborhood has many pan handlers and street noise that can be heard in the room. I used my ear plugs and was fine.( I am a light sleeper) My daughter was looking at Universities and this was a good location near the 110. The breakfast is orange juice, coffee and a sweet roll. The internet worked smoothly for our 3 day stay. The only improvement I could suggest would be the paper products- not looking for brand name just a better quality.

Reviews.Title: “Check In!”
Reviews.Author: Keneth T
Reviews.Content: The manager was very nice. The room was cozy and clean. If you're a couple, get the room with a jacuzzi(;, you won't regret it. The television had hbo and lots of other channels to choose from. There was a fridge and a microwave also. The location was near a lot of restaurants so hunger wouldn't be a problem. The cost of the room was reasonable, it wasn't expensive at all. We had an awesome time here, it was great!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Affordable and nice attention, but a little away from attractions”
Reviews.Author: CBassG
Reviews.Content: The hotel manager was very nice, the room was clean and the neiborhood was OK. The only thing is that is a little away from the hottest area (Hollywood & Beverly Hills). But the breakfast was good and the value excelent.

Reviews.Title: “Safe, clean, great location for overnight stay on LAX-Cruise ship terminal transfer”
Reviews.Author: alf5688
Reviews.Content: We experienced a safe, clean, newly renovated room with fridge and microwave. Very reasonably priced for Los Angeles, walking distance to food and drink. WiFi and continental breakfast was included. Excellent location for low cost, city bus transfer to cruise ship terminal. LAX terminal bus "C" takes you to city bus stop. First take bus 232- LAX to S. Western Ave- (This hotel is located here for an overnight stay). Next day, take bus 205 right to the gate of cruise ship terminal. Two buses at $1.50 each is better than a $50-75 transfer fee. Carry on size luggage is accommodated in space at the front of buses. We enjoyed a relaxed evening stay at Rodeway, prior to our trip the next day. We felt that taking an early morning flight, then quick transfer to the ship terminal a little too stressful to start a cruise. Also a high priced LA hotel was not the way we wanted to start a trip.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely clean and affordable”
Reviews.Author: Joan G
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a hotel with all the bells and whistles, this isn't the place. But, if you want an extremely clean and comfortable place to lay your head for a night or two, this is it. The neighborhood is a little iffy, but the motel is ideally located within a few miles of the tourist attractions of Long Beach. Although our room had a refrigerator and microwave, it was missing the standard coffee pot. But the manager bent over backwards to please and for the price you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Steven N
Reviews.Content: We have a very good stay. The manager Patel was kind and courteous. Everything was clean and exactly what we needed in an inn. What more could you ask for? Especially with the great price. I would definitely stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and convenient”
Reviews.Author: lab8023
Reviews.Content: We were very satisfied with our stay - wish we could have stayed longer. Excellent location - convenient to restaurants and port. Management was top notch. Room was spacious, clean and extremely comfortable with all the conveniences of home (fridge, microwave, etc.) Highly recommend this hotel to all.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome, will return again!”
Reviews.Author: mulox
Reviews.Content: Very clean and excellent service. Great value for the price, we stayed with my wife and 2 kids and had a pleasant stay. Only minor complaint was that our room did not have a coffee maker, but found out you can get one if you pay $5 more per day. The double was a bit small for us, trying to fit an 8 year old and 3 year old was a bit challenging with my wife and I, but hey, it is a motel, so you kind of expect that.

Reviews.Title: “good stay”
Reviews.Author: madhousedad
Reviews.Content: Good place to stay. Room was clean and comfortable. As others have stated parking was a little tight but manageable. My only issue was that when the people in the next room started the bath it was very loud in my room. I did not bother to complain as it was just a few minutes each night. Overall a good value for a clean place to stay near the city..

Reviews.Title: “Great deal for the money”
Reviews.Author: rosstiferian
Reviews.Content: This motel provides a nice environment in a busy city neighbor. Sitting right next to PCH, I thought it would be pretty noisy, but much to my surprise, it was pleasantly quite. The rooms are clean, fully equipped, and flat screen TV's are a nice touch. Mr. Patel runs a tight ship, shows concern for his guests and was pleasant in all respects. I would recommend this motel to anyone looking for a convenient location near the Palos Verdes Peninsula and harbor area..

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: alejandrolau
Reviews.Content: Clean and comfortable. Courteous service. Great value. Nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: “Three night stay while visiting LA”
Reviews.Author: farside41
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 nights on a quickly planned trip to California, the price was great and the hotel was very nice. Room was clean and recently updated. Short drive to Redondo Beach and lots of good places to eat. Continental breakfast wasn't the best, but was adequate. Location was good, it was about a 30 minute drive from most of the things we wanted to see, which in LA it seems like everything is at least 30 minutes away.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT Service Comfortable Rooms Good Location”
Reviews.Author: Scott B
Reviews.Content: As a coast to coast traveler for over 20 years, I found this location to be among the best in its class. Friendly staff, renovated rooms, clean, quite, comfortable. A GREAT value and a favorable location make this property a TOP PICK for me when staying in the Long Beach, CA. area.

Reviews.Title: “Super Clean Super friendly”
Reviews.Author: UrbanMiner
Reviews.Content: Reviews were right on this one. Clean, friendly and convienent to the Beach Cities. I have status with several hotel chains, but for the price & location, this is perfect!

Reviews.Title: “A perfect Motel”
Reviews.Author: Johann M
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in August for 2 nights with 3 Persons coming from Brussels for holiday reasons. What we saw was really amazing. The Motel is about 30 min away from Santa Monica and about 40 min away from Hollywood Blvd by car. The room we had was very quiet, even though the Motel is located on a heavy traffic road. The room was very clean and the modern updates like granite bathroom features and amenities were very nice .Wifi worked perfectly. Mr. Patel, the manager, was exceedingly polite and helpful. He is one of the most service- oriented managers we ever have encountered.. He could not have been friendlier and more helpful .We can strongly recommend this nice Motel on Pacific Coast Highway and will come back next time we are in L.A.

Reviews.Title: “Belated Review”
Reviews.Author: Sethyne W
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 3 nights, July 2-5, 2011. Sorry Patel to be so tardy in making this review! We found the accomodations to be clean; prompt and friendly staff- no problems at all- we were a little worried about the parking when the hotel was full, but it turned out to be no problem, and we could see our car from our room on the second floor. All in all it was a great stay- close to the beach where we were attending a wedding. Close to Torrance Beach fireworks and also the fireworks out in the bay near Rancho Palos Verdes. I believe we really got a lot of service for very little money! Many thanks to Patel and his staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay near LA”
Reviews.Author: ademan_nl
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for four nights in mid September. It was our last stop during our three week holiday in western USA. The staff was very friendly and rooms are nice and clean. Our room was located on the the 2nd floor, facing the PCH. We had no problems with the noise levels during the nights. Room was equipped with a flat screen (with lots of channels), a refrigerator and a microwave. Beds and bathroom where nice too. If we ever need a place in the area, we would definitely have this on top of our list

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel pick”
Reviews.Author: mindsetsuccess23
Reviews.Content: Great stay simple as it gets for business trip! Anytime I am in Harbor city this is where I am staying I advise you to do the same!

Reviews.Title: “Upgraded Rooms-Clean and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: avidhiker2
Reviews.Content: Close enough to Los Angeles Convention Center where I was attending a conference, to take a shower and get a good nite's sleep. Rooms have been upgraded too. Although it is in located along a strip-row of business and appears industrial, for the money I don't think it can be beat.

Reviews.Title: “Best Rodeway I've Ever Seen”
Reviews.Author: westoverroad
Reviews.Content: The manager, Mr. Patel, is one of the most service-oriented hotel managers I've ever encountered. He runs a clean ship and exceeded our expectations. The room was amazing (for a Rodeway Inn). It had granite bathroom counter tops and crown molding on the ceilings. The bedspread looked new. The curtains and cornice were tastefully done. The wireless internet was adequate (the typical DSL speed). The flat screen TV had a great picture and a wide variety of channel selections. The room was clean and quiet. The water pressure in the shower was strong and the water was plentiful. When we had checked in, we had left our camera at the counter. We didn't realize the camera was missing until we were in the parking lot and about to leave. We went to the office to get a key to go search our room. Mr. Patel handed the camera to us and said he'd been trying to find the owner of the camera since the day before. He said he's got one valuable item he's held for 18 months, waiting for the owner to show up and claim it! The only things we thought might be improved were that there was some sort of smell in our room and the continental breakfast consisted of only coffee, orange juice and pastries in plastic wrappers. The area is not the best, but we never felt unsafe. Overall, it is an amazing place to stay if you are looking for a discount hotel in the South Bay/ Long Beach area of LA. If all hotels were managed this well, there would be no need for TripAdvisor. Thankfully, TripAdvisor is here to help us find diamonds in the rough like this Rodeway Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Return visit”
Reviews.Author: kbienvenu
Reviews.Content: Our second and third stay at the Rodeway.. As before service was excellent and rooms as clean as ever.. Our second visit was uneventful, we brought a third person with us managing to get a roll away just about in room, owner is extremely obliging offering to remove some furniture to make room.. The third visit was marred by noisy guests up till 5 am talking loud in the car park and on the balcony. I lightly sleep so had difficulty drifting off.. And can only assume got the wrong room after drinking as were trying key card in our door.. Luckily I have my sons with me.. Had I been female and alone I'm sure it would have been rather frightening. But you really can't blame the owner for his guests getting drunk and eating pizza all night. If you're looking for a no thrills but very good value stay I would highly recommend this Rodeway, it's clean and area is safe.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for small family!”
Reviews.Author: Myrcov
Reviews.Content: Everything was great just wished the beds were queen and not twins. I would remove small table for more space. But good for a quick weekend trip.

Reviews.Title: “VERY friendly, clean and convenient location”
Reviews.Author: JanekinVancouver
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for seven nights in August, while visiting Los Angeles for the first time. Mr. Patel, the manager, was exceedingly polite and helpful. Our original room was equipped with a king size bed, flat screen TV, a large fridge and microwave oven. Everything was very clean in the room: carpets, walls, ceilings and the bathroom too. Only one defect: the bath towels provided always seemed to have a few long black hairs embedded. My spouse can't stand hairs, so I had to exchange those repeatedly. We also had a noticeable bad odour emanating from the air conditioner. Once I reported this to Mr. Patel, who verified the problem, he was so prompt in offering us to change rooms- which we did. Not only did he do this, but the very next day HVAC technicians showed up and began to dismantle and clean all of the buildings AC units. The manager was exceptional in his customer service, and left us very satisfied clients of this motel. The second room we stayed in had two double beds, a bathroom and an additional sink. It also had a window that faced Pacific Coast Highway, which was better than the first room adjacent to a business. I would definitely recommend staying here while one comes to LA, especially if you plan to spend (as you should) a lot of time at the nearby beaches. The location, in south LA beside Lomita and Torrance, is very close to the Harbour freeway, and easy to access the Hollywood area (depending upon city traffic!!). Also, the motel was quiet, clean and comfortable beds to sleep in. This is exactly what any traveller expects, and this Rodeway delivers.

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel close to LA.”
Reviews.Author: Naveed N
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my wife at the Rodeway Inn en Route to SFO. We can strongly recommend this nice Motel on the Pacific Coast Highway. The manager is a very nice & honest person. Rooms are clean & well equipped. Most importantly: A very service-oriented location. TOP!

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended!”
Reviews.Author: padreyes
Reviews.Content: Before making my reservations, I read numerous review regarding Rodeway Inn on Pacific Coast and a common theme I noticed was that this establishment was very clean and well kept. I stayed 5 nights late in August and the reviews didn't lie. Clean and comfy! The one thing I loved about the Inn was its location. Not too far off from several shopping centers in Del Amo and the Galleria. The 110 isn't far off either if you want to make a trip downtown. The parking lot was a little tight at times, but I saw several SUV's maneuver themselves into spaces. Overall, I would highly recommend Rodeway Inn!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Artemis K
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for 5 nights in a standard room and used it as our base to discover LA. The location is very good - plenty of shops/takeaways and a very good supermarket close by, so nothing to worry about when came back late from our day trip. Ample and spacious parking provided. The room itself was extremely clean, refrigerator and microwave worked very well - and were very clean as well. TV and WiFi worked great, with great picture/signal respectively. We're not very big on breakfast in general, so just had some coffee a couple of times, but everything looked decent and we greatly appreciated the free local newspaper provided daily. The manager is very helpful, very kind and always there so we felt really safe in all respects, both at night when there was always someone vigilant at the entrance and during the day, as we could always rely on any problems being resolved in seconds. A very good experience in general, the gentleman running the hotel certainly knows his job and does his best, and, if we weren't at the other end of the planet, we'd certainly come back!

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable and clean”
Reviews.Author: asthadhakarey
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights. The rooms were clean and bed was very comfortable. It had a refrigerator and microwave which was a bonus for such inexpensive price. The Manager was helpful and polite. We needed printouts for our Universal Studios visit and he gladly printed for us for free. We would like to stay here whenever we are in LA.

Reviews.Title: “We really appreciated our stay”
Reviews.Author: Tor189541
Reviews.Content: Very nice and clean rooms, god locations with easy travel to all the Los Angeles attraction, and a very friendly and helpful staff. We stayed for three days and highly recommend the hotel to anyone looking for the best value for their money.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we would go there again for sure!”
Reviews.Author: Caroline M
Reviews.Content: The reasonably priced hotel is pretty well located: it's about 30 min away from Santa Monica and about 40 min away from Hollywood Blvd (by car). Check-in: after noon. Check-out: before 11 AM. The bedroom and the bathroom are very convenient, very clean, and in a more than very good condition; the bed is big and very comfortable. Very useful in the room: a microwave and a fridge. The Wi-Fi is free and works very well; the free parking lot is a little bit small but perfectly safe; Pacific Coast Highway is a very busy street, but you donâ€™t ear any noise from the outside when you are inside your room: itâ€™s quiet and peaceful. Staff members are very friendly and very helpful. Very good orange juice and coffee for the breakfast (the only one complain would be the scare food choice for breakfast). We loved it and we would go there again for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Great clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: J C
Reviews.Content: This was my second time staying here on a business trip. The person at the front desk was very helpful and nice. The location is off of a main street, so there are many food and store locations close by. The inside of the hotel has been remodeled so it is very clean & nice. Unlike many of the other hotels, this one has a nice I believe to be a 27" or 32" lcd flat tv in the room for watching your favorite shows. It also has a microwave, fridge, and free wifi to get online. The room itself is a decent size and is comfortable. There is a small parking area for parking so you don't have to worry about paying for any parking your car. Over all I would recommend this hotel and would stay there again if I need to spend the night in that area. If you are in the area and need a good place to stay, I would check this hotel out first so you wouldn't have to waste your time looking around and spend the time doing other more important things on your trip. =)

Reviews.Title: “Near good SoCal Beaches”
Reviews.Author: D-Traveler37
Reviews.Content: The wife and I stayed here the week of August 16th through August 19th. We arrived around 2:30pm and the first thing I noticed was how small the parking lot was. I thought that would be an issue later on at night but as it turned out it was just fine. Mr. Patel checked us in and he was very friendly and informed us about the rooms and there location. My wife wanted to stay on the 2nd floor but she also wanted to face the lot so we could have easy access to our car. Mr. Patel informed us that there were no rooms available on the 2nd floor that faced the lot but there was one on the first floor and we were fine with that. The inn faces the Pacific Coast Hwy....so needless to say there can be a lot of travel throughout the day from people heading to Redondo.....Manhattan.....or Hermosa Beach. All of these beaches are only a few miles up the road....and that was a definite plus in more ways than one. The room key Mr. Patel gave us was quite unique because it was designed to be plugged into a slot in the room to supply the electricity. I had never seen that before....but I did learn that due to California's energy problems.....a ton of hotels....motels....inns....etc....was using all sorts of methods to save and conserve both energy and water. Now be advised you can get an extra room key and just leave the other one in the slot...especially if you want to leave the air running in case it is a warm day. The staff prefers for you to take it with you....to save the energy in the room.....however we left in the slot most days and that seemed to cause some problems. The cleaning staff on two separate occasions took the cards out of the slot and then replaced them when they finished cleaning the room. This would cause our second card not to work and Mr. Patel was more than happy to recharge it for us so we could get into our room. Now while this was a little unsettling it is really the only bad thing I have to say about this locale. The rooms are small...which has been expressed in many of the reviews I have read for this location....however it was fine with us and the noise level from outside was almost none existent. Now I have to stress if you can get an upstairs room PLEASE DO....because some of the visitors that stay here don't know how to walk softly and the walls and ceilings are a bit thin....but not horrible. The breakfast is nothing special....coffee....danish.....orange juice. The also offer the daily L.A.times each morning for your reading pleasure.....LOL. The bed is very comfortable and we enjoyed our 4 night stay here.....there are plenty of restaurants and shopping near by.....along with the beaches I spoke of earlier. So get out early.....stay out late....but know when you return the lot may be crowded but there are parks even though the lot is very small. However once you do park know that you will get a good night's sleep at the Rodeway Inn and Suites on the Gorgeous Pacific Coast Hwy.

Reviews.Title: “Very good motel”
Reviews.Author: Luquita81
Reviews.Content: It is located in Harbor City, it is a good choice for visiting L.A. Â The room was very clean and nicely furnished. The breakfast was essential. The owners are kind and polite and are always available for any information.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended, We loved it and we will be back end August 2011”
Reviews.Author: Steve32848
Reviews.Content: I needed a hotel room close to where I was working for 1 week, in San Pedro during July 2011, the position was perfect for me with freeway access. The room rate was a great value that can not be beat in Southern California. The rooms itself was large and clean with 32 inch TV, Microwave, and fridge, Ideal for a week long stay, for single person or family, the bed was very comfortable and the bathroom looked like it was recently re done and like new. The service and security from the front desk was excellent, as well as the free continental breakfast and free news paper & free parking . Need I add that the WiFi was also free and easy to use. It was also very central to fast food and other restaurants as well as markets to buy your own food for the room I highly recommend this hotel for your next stay in Southern California. I am returning at the end of August for another stay.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, clean, charming host/manager”
Reviews.Author: CoreExpression
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed this hotel for the 2 nights that we were there. The 2 nights previous I had slept somewhere else on a blow up mattress so when I saw the big king bed I immediately had a fantastic nap upon mid day arrival. Very comfy. The manager was super and went out of his way to accomodate us. It's true that the even though it's right on a busy road, the room was very quiet. The recently redone bathroom in granite and shower was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel, great place, great manager”
Reviews.Author: Claude V
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two days in this Motel while visiting LA. The rooms are new, very comfortable exceptionally clean. The room we had was very quiet, even though the Motel is located on a heavy traffic road. Moreover the manager was extremely nice and friendly. The rates are incredibly low for what one gets. The only negative aspect I could think of is the location: the neighbourhood is not that interesting, and it takes about 40mn drive from Malibu or Hollywood. But it seems that driving from anywhere to anywhere else in LA takes at least 20-30 mn, so this was not a real issue. We were delighted by our stay and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “A friendly & clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: AirLinguist
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at Rodeway Inn & Suites after reading reviews on TripAdvisor. Mr. Pattel, the manager, was very helpful and kind and took time to make sure everything went smoothly with our stay. The rooms were very clean, there modern updates like granite bathroom features and the amenities were nice. We stayed at another hotel on Pacific Coast Highway about a month ago and this hotel was infinitely nicer and cleaner. Mr. Pattel's friendliness and helpfulness made all the difference.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and nice bathrooms”
Reviews.Author: csadsit
Reviews.Content: Looked at the reviews and stayed here for a business trip. Room was slightly dated but the bathroom looked newly remodled. Very nice marble look. Strong shower nozzle, not drippy. Excellent value for the price. Dont be fooled by the 'breakfast', (cup of coffee or o.j. and commerical wraped pastry). Plan on getting breakfast. Bed was very comportable and the air conditioning worked fast. Close to everything in SoCal if you have a car. if you doont plaan to stay in the room much its a good sleep. Quiet. I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Second stay, nice place.”
Reviews.Author: j99999
Reviews.Content: Patel is a nice person to deal with. We have stayed here two different times and has always been a nice, clean room. Breakfast is advertised, but pretty much roll and juice. Very nice beds. Rooms we have had look freshly remodeled and very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, comfortable and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Repps152
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night with my family after a long journey. Had the best night sleep so far on our travels. Good location and plenty of amenities nearby. Would definitely book again.

Reviews.Title: “My stay is excellect”
Reviews.Author: feebaby
Reviews.Content: The stay was wonderful rooms are nice and clean which i like so i would stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Great place w/ great price!”
Reviews.Author: livininwonderland
Reviews.Content: First of all the place is clean! When I first got here i was wowed by the design n nicely laid out room. The design and layout of the place is great and the price is unbeatable for its value. Everything is wiped and washed clean. And if you are unsatisfied or need a special request for the room, Mr. Patel will be more than happy to satisfy your request and make sure that it is what you needed or wanted. All the staffs here are very friendly too (including the cleaners) and will say hi to you like your next door neighbor. Really like it here! =)

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, clean and neat”
Reviews.Author: nikkij238
Reviews.Content: I had a great stay here. The manager, Mr. Patel was very nice. The room was clean and newly remodeled. It had marble tiled floors in the bathroom and marble tile on the sink. I like the fact that it had a nice big flat screen TV and a microwave and refrigerator. The room was very quiet. I had no problems while staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Best place in this price range in the whole area. We loved it.”
Reviews.Author: heyalchang
Reviews.Content: The Inn is very clean and newly remodeled. Mr Patel could not have been friendlier and more helpful. The bathrooms are all marble/stone. He's made wonderful decisions to make the rooms both easy to maintain, while beautiful and comfortable for the guests. Very very smart choices. Parking lot spaces are a bit tight. I couldn't recommend this place more if you're in the area. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Tidy, Good Location, Would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: LucyShropshire
Reviews.Content: My partner and I stayed here whilst travelling around California for three nights. We did not arrive until midnight on our first night, we weren't sure if we would be locked out or not but the receptionist was there and very accomodating considering the hour, The guy on reception was friendly and very helpful. The hotel is situated in a good location not far from long beach and the southern california area. The rooms were well maintained, ours looked like it had possibly been redecorated. The cleaners came round every day to clean the rooms and did a very good job. This would be an ideal place to stop for anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Surprise!!”
Reviews.Author: sumosumo
Reviews.Content: This is a Small no Frills hotel(no pool, gym, business ctr), but it is very clean, rooms are newly remodeled, comfortable beds, but they are full size not queens, in the rooms with double beds, there is a fridge, microwave and flat screen tv and free wifi. The hotel was quiet and clean on the outside, well lit parking lot, coffee and rolls every morning. Close to fast foods, other restaurants and shopping. Pacific Coast Hwy is a very busy and noisy street during the day, so be careful driving in and out of the parking lot. You still cannot hear any street noise, oh and ac works great. and great price. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: skybo13
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a very nice hotel to stay in very clean, quite and affordable. The desk man was very kind and helpful. He even loaned us his bottle opener. Would definately recommend to my friends and stay there again myself.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and hospitable and we're picky”
Reviews.Author: confam
Reviews.Content: We stayed there 4 of us on vacation. While the rooms where a bit small the cleanliness of the place and the hospitality was outstanding. If we visit Los Angeles again we will stay there and we are very picky. Thank you Rodeway!!!

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable I'm coming back”
Reviews.Author: je007
Reviews.Content: Was a great place to stay ,very clean and what a great staff.they were very helpful. the room vas cozy and clean.there was great food in the area also.

Reviews.Title: “Best Deal in the South Bay - Clean, with all the amenities”
Reviews.Author: EdgeEarth
Reviews.Content: Rodeway Inn at PCH and Western â€“ Iâ€™ve never taken the time to write a hotel review, but this was such an exceptional experience that it deserved one. Mr. Patel at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. The hotel is remodeled, so everything is clean and new. Our room had a nice LCD-TV, fridge, microwave, and two sinks (inside and outside of the bathroom). Oh yeah, and a powerful air conditioner that kept us comfortable. The location is at a busy intersection, but the traffic noise wasnâ€™t bad at all. The rates are extremely reasonable, making this hotel the best deal (by far) in the South Bay. I grew up in the area, and will definitely use this hotel every time I go to visit friends and family. - Kevin

Reviews.Title: “Empressed”
Reviews.Author: adlo21
Reviews.Content: I was visiting from San Diego to Los Angeles with my wife and the hotel I usually stay at messed up my reservations, so I had to find a hotel near to the location to where I had a reunion. I found a room here at Rodeway Inn & Suites and the service was great! I got a non smoking room with a king size bed and the room was extremely clean. I rooms looked like they were recently upgraded with mable restroom tile and granite. The room was just $75 and I will definetly be staying here next time I'm visiting South Bay L.A. In additon, they showed me a room with built in sauna, which is the room I'll be staying next time. Good choice here!

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: JLaw33037
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were looking for a quiet comfortable hotel in Southern California for a quick trip and this was definitely it. The service was great and despite being on the PCH we didn't hear any noise at night. The rooms were very nice and well maintained. I was particularly impressed with our rooms bathroom - I wasn't expecting the quality of features in a hotel like this.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing service and very very clean”
Reviews.Author: richased
Reviews.Content: This hotel provided me with a comfortable stay and a very friendly helpful staff. I first arrived at the hotel with a reservation with the wrong date and the front desk even though I did not have a reservation or even a credit card on hand helped me get a room for the night and i decided to stay for the full two weeks of my vacation at this location. Not only was it well kept but the flat screen TV in my room just added to a nice atmosphere after long days of work. I would always come back if I ever needed to continue business in the LA area.

Reviews.Title: “Donâ€™t just a book by itâ€™s cover”
Reviews.Author: DamyG
Reviews.Content: Wouldnâ€™t picked it if we drove by, but because of the good reviews we slept their one night. And we had nothing to complain. The rooms where a bit small, but really clean and had where good maintained. Except for some kit randjes, but thatâ€™s almost in every hotel/motel. From the outside the hotel looks good aswell, altough itâ€™s a motel it doesnâ€™t have the â€˜shabbyâ€™ look most motels have. The breakfast was simple: coffee, orange juice and some pastries. We can understand why he was the gold winner for 2011. The manager, Patel, was really really friendly en helpfull. It was nice for a change that the manager/clerk was really friendly and helpfull. As first Dutch customers we really can recommend the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean room, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: borg81
Reviews.Content: Stay here for business occasionally. Rooms are always clean and the fixtures are new as of this writing. The staff is very friendly. Breakfast is light, and the orange juice is good. Location on PCH is busy but close to shopping and resturants. Always cool here since it is close to the ocean.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: MJ4021
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice motel conveniently located to visit the LA area. Although it's situated next to the main road (Pacific Coast Hwy), it was very quiet. The room was perfectly clean and bathroom looked recently renovated. There was indeed a modern flat screen with lots of TV channels, high-speed Internet, fridge and microwave, but no coffee-making facilities. The staff at the reception was very friendly. Overall it was an excellent value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Great, great value for the L.A. area!”
Reviews.Author: bythemoon
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this motel for five nights, and it was a real find. It was by far the most inexpensive stay I've had in L.A., and I sacrificed very little in terms of comfort. It is definitely a motel and not a hotel, so be prepared for that style of arrangement, but the rooms are spacious with a contemporary and generously sized bathroom. The bed was quite comfortable, the free Wi-Fi worked, and the room had a flat-screen television and a small fridge (perfect when your budget is tight). There's not much to distinguish the appointments in this room from a much more expensive hotel. With the free parking and basic continental breakfast (juice, coffee, pastries), you have an unbelievable bargain for SoCal. If you want to stay near the beaches and/or Orange County, this is a great location; the area is very commercial (not glamorous), but gas stations, groceries, restaurants, laundries, etc. are close by. A short drive down the PCH puts you in Long Beach; you will drive through an industrial area, but after that, a string of attractive beach cities awaits. The proprietor of this Rodeway is a very kind and professional gentleman who keeps everything in tip-top shape. Note: the parking lot has plenty of spaces but is compact, so don't bring a tractor-trailer truck.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: wilcodis
Reviews.Content: Ok, the place is about a half an hour drive from down town LA but other than that it is a great place and the staff is so friendly that it is almost like family. We stayed at at this place for two nights. The bathroom was recently renovated, the room was clean, great tv-set with free HBO and it includes a moderate breakfast. Definitely go back there!

Reviews.Title: “What a great getaway!”
Reviews.Author: VagrantSoul
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a nice quiet place to just getaway for the weekend, when I came across this gem! The staff was kind, quick and professional. The room was clean which is always a fear of mine. I was checked in, and within minutes I was enjoying peace and quiet. I love this place, and intend to stay there again, when the need arrvies!

Reviews.Title: “Newly renovated, very clean, all amenities”
Reviews.Author: BDub6
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with our room and its facilities - large flat screen TV, cable/HBO, fridge, microwave -- all new. Separate desk and dining table areas. All newly-renovated and very clean. Great value.

Reviews.Title: “Great place! Clean, good and friendly service, value for money!”
Reviews.Author: dianepoon
Reviews.Content: Rodeway was a great place to stay in. My boyfriend and I were pleasantly surprised by the clean room, nice toilet and big television. I would definitely recommend it as it is very value for money! Furthermore, the location is good as well, it is near many other motels and there are many food options around the area. If you are planning to visit disneyland as well as universal studios, but you wanna stay in a single hotel so that you dont have to pack and move around, this would be a great place to stay at as it is in the middle of both! Service was very very good, the manager was very kind to us and often chatted with us. Thank you sir for all your help and hospitality by the way! He encouraged us to help ourselves to breakfast, consisting of orange juice, coffee and pastry. I really enjoyed my stay here and I would encourage those looking for a good deal to visit this hotel! you wont regret it!

Reviews.Title: “Good Rates and very clean.”
Reviews.Author: oscars1130
Reviews.Content: Our service was very good the man at the front desk was very nice and friendly . The room was very nice and clean we really liked the fact that it has a microwave, refrigerator and other amenities that are very useful. Also loved that it has alot of places to go eat nearby. The best thing is that it has good rates the only bad thing was that there wasnt enough hot water and our view was the wall but other than that everything else was good and we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place! Friendly Management!”
Reviews.Author: Jess415
Reviews.Content: We just needed a place to stay for a couple of days and this place has been wonderful! Everyone is friendly, it's very clean and I would recommend to anyone just passing through or otherwise! Comfortable bed, and great price too!!

Reviews.Title: “Room condition”
Reviews.Author: timlht06
Reviews.Content: Hi, I'm from malaysia. So far this hotel is the cleaness I stay before with the low room rate. The room is definite clean and tidy. I like this!

Reviews.Title: “Just to remember for the next trip to LA”
Reviews.Author: endless15
Reviews.Content: Very efficent service, nice people, very clean and no expensive, perfect for for people who travel for pleasure and tourism.

Reviews.Title: “This is a very nice inexpensive motel”
Reviews.Author: Junquedealer11
Reviews.Content: We arrived on a Thursday evening for a 4 night stay. This is in an area of many, many not so nice looking hotels and I was kind of afraid of what we were getting into. I was very pleasantly surprised. The owner was very nice and upgraded me from a double room to a king room. The room was very clean and modern. The shower had great water pressure and although the motel was on a busy street there was very little street noise. There is free coffee, pastries and newspapers in the lobby in the morning and the owner was extremely accommodating. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend this motel to anyone. I have stayed in hotels 3 times the price that were not as nice. Thank you for your hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Its Class!”
Reviews.Author: Mattermind
Reviews.Content: This place is an absolute budget oasis. What a find. The reviews are right on target! We live in LA and have been looking for a reasonable place to crash after shows for years. We recently turned Echo & the Bunnymen into a weekend getaway. This went beyond anything we expected. Why? Super friendly staff. Immaculate -- truly spotless rooms. No traffic noise... what a godsend! Free parking. Free fast wifi. The little things just keep adding up. Veggie Grill, Trader Joes, Sprouts and Whole Foods all within 5 miles. Downtown LA within 20. Knowing this place is here is a game-changer! Just don't come expecting the Four Seasons. Rather, consider it the best budget hotel you ever stayed at and you'll be blown away!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean comfortable room, excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: JulieYorkshireUK
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night on 25th April 2011 on way down to San diego and again on 4th May when travelling back. The hotel is excellent value for money, cost includes breakfast which consists of coffee, orange juice and danish pastries. Rooms were exceptionally clean, the bed was very comfortable, large flat screen TV in the room. Mr Patel the hotel manager was very helpful. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and would definately stay again if in that area.

Reviews.Title: “My stay was very comfortable and the location is convenient.”
Reviews.Author: arealiveangel
Reviews.Content: I recommend this hotel to anyone needing a place in a hurry. My syay was very relaxed considering my situation. The manager there (Mr. Patel) was very nice. He made sure I had what i needed. My suite was private and confortable Mr.Patel was very understanding of my situation. He made sure my stay was pleasant. Thank Mr.Patel and the Rodeway Staff. Lisa Brown

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean, comfortable”
Reviews.Author: hoteljgm
Reviews.Content: I'd plan on staying here again. It was a good location for me and right on Pacific Coast Highway, Clean room.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel & price, a little noisy because of highway”
Reviews.Author: Berto2727
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 5 nights as a base for visiting the Hollywood and Los Angeles area which is about a 30 minute drive, mostly highway. I liked the hotel very much and would recommend it to anyone interested. The bed matresses' were very comfortable and I slept well after spending the day touring. Parking was easy and there are many spots available. Breakfast is just coffee, orange juice and little pre-packed pasteries - just enough to wake up to but you can walk to the McDonalds down the street for a full breakfast or drive to Denny's. There are a lot of small shops nearby where you can get everything you need. The inn keeper is amazing, very polite and kind. The hotel is super clean. My wife and teenage daughter enjoyed the room too. Wireless internet signal was excellent and fast. As for the noisy highway, it's true. It will get loud enough at 06h00 in the morning to wake you up if you are a lite sleeper. It's not loud during the night time but it does pickup in noise level starting at 06h00. Coming from Montreal, Canada the 06h00 a.m. LA time was like 09h00 a.m. Montreal time so no issue for me. But as I adjusted to the LA time, I did find it too loud for 06h00 a.m. But then again, you can't do much without a car in LA so get used to the traffic and noise. Again great hotel and would go back in a minute next time I'm in LA.

Reviews.Title: “Good clean cheap motel.”
Reviews.Author: bigblackdog18
Reviews.Content: Had a stay of four nights in April. Room was clean and tidy with nothing broken and a large tv and fridge. Window faced onto a brick wall but who spends time looking out and it helped cut traffic noise from the busy highway. Mr Patel is a nice guy and helpful if you have any problems. This is a good low cost motel but if you expect to much you should pay a lot more and go elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Remember this is a 2 star motel!”
Reviews.Author: richc78
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel two weeks ago and made the booking based on reviews, perhaps naively, from this website. First thing to remember is that is a bog-standard motel next to a busy road, not as some have said like a 4 -star hotel. Yes it has had a lick of paint, the tv is a 32" LCD and there's a full sized fridge and that is perhaps why people speak so highly of it! But just a warning to people it is very noisy: Firstly because of the road, and we were woken up at 5.30am by a lorry unloading about 6ft from our room window. We had booked for 2 nights and just stayed one! OK if u want to crash for the night but some of these reviews seem a little over enthusiastic. A lesson learnt in that u get what u pay for!!

Reviews.Title: “I wish I lived there”
Reviews.Author: Rover012
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel approximately 4 times over the last 9 months and have been quite impressed with the comfortability of the rooms. The beds are large, linens fresh. Cable television has a multitude of channels to watch. Mostly basic cable, but there were several premium movie channels available. I make it a point to stay in this hotel whenever I am spending a night in the area. I've run into the same manager on each occasion, always helpful and curteous.

Reviews.Title: “Nice accommodations for price.”
Reviews.Author: foogirl52
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night and was very impressed with the cleanliness, room decor, bathroom and location for the price, especially in the LA area. On PCH so some traffic noise because I was in a ground level room near front of motel, however, not so loud I couldn't easily fall asleep. Very comfortable bed. Owner, Mr. Patel, was very helpful. Includes coffee/rolls and juice in morning and free WiFi and cable TV. Close to a McDonald's and other fast food chains with a lot of local restaurants. Would definitely stay here again as a woman traveling solo and recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Just fine for a short stay.”
Reviews.Author: lareba
Reviews.Content: Gave it a try after reading trip advisor reviews. It was fine for a place that is fairly close to the beaches we wanted to visit. The room was clean and had internet access. The manager was very nice and I was surprised with a minimal type of breakfast in the morning. The only down side was that the fridge made loud noises in the morning so we unplugged it.

Reviews.Title: “Will come back any time”
Reviews.Author: kbienvenu
Reviews.Content: I can not add anything contrary to what has already been said with regards the excellent state of rooms and high level of service.. Example been greeted by owned at 5.45am in slippers and pyjamas who offered me newspaper and made coffee early and given extra danish.. Will be returning to LA in June and coming back.. Well done..

Reviews.Title: “Amazingness”
Reviews.Author: Sonya310
Reviews.Content: My stays at the Roadway Inn have been the best!! My husband and i have been renting out the room w/ the jacuzzi inside. And all i can say is that it's awesome to be able to relax with a jacuzzi in the room. The beds are comfortable, the flat screen tvs are nice, and the whole rooms in general, are very clean, and comfortable. I wouldl definitely reccomend the Roadway Inn to anybody who is looking for a place to stay, or simply just get away from home..!!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasing, comfortable and a definate value for the money.”
Reviews.Author: teak2011
Reviews.Content: A quaint, clean and comfy modern room. With 32 inch LCD tv and on demand hbo cable. Wait there is more, the room also contains a refriderator and microwave. These can come in handy when yoou are vacationing on a budget. The manager is a great guy. Very accomodating and is respectful to everyone who he speaks with. This Inn is the hidden gem of pacific coast hwy, that feels more like a 4-Star Bungalo Retreat in Costa Rica. You will not be disappointed that you stayed at the RODEWAY INN & SUITES pacific coast highway, CA juan di higo www.premierteak.com

Reviews.Title: “Best Rodeway Inn ever”
Reviews.Author: Lunatic213
Reviews.Content: Stayed 4 days i was almost in a home away from home flat screen t.v.'s, nice decor in bathroom, comfortable king size bed, fridge in room, satelite t.v. mirrored closet doors very, very nice!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great, friendly service. Spotless comfy room!”
Reviews.Author: MZiolko
Reviews.Content: I would stay here again! The price is perfect, the manager/owner was AWESOME, and the room was spotless and comfy. They also had free WiFi and parking. Great place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: joe268
Reviews.Content: I have requested a king bed room when I made reservation, they give me a queen bed room at internal corner next to a meter room with a window facing a wall, so I turn back to the front desk and asking for a room change, they tell me that there is a charge difference of $20 for 3 nights stay but they waived it although I agreed to pay. They gave me a room with recycle bin and refuse bin under my window, and it is the only room with these bins. In fact, the hotel is quite empty, I just kept my window and curtain closed for the price of $60+tax /night. Generally, the hotel is quite nice, friendly staff, clean and new renovated room, facilities was close, 3 dollars car wash next door, forget about the breakfast they offer. Recommended to travelers looking for a reasonable place and budget.

Reviews.Title: “Devalues the Rodeway Inn brand”
Reviews.Author: twriter
Reviews.Content: Needed a hotel for one night before a conference in Long Beach. TripAdvisor reviews were good, the cost was OK, so I booked it. Let's start with the good things. It's easy to find, not far off the freeway and right on PCH. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. And surprisingly the room was fairly quiet, at least from traffic noise. But let's face it, this is a little dingy strip motel, still hanging around from the days of automobile vacations. It's a bitsy two-level ell of a property with a small parking lot right on PCH. It's clear Rodeway recently purchased this property and slapped its name on it, as the handwritten reservation slip still had the previous name at the top in old-style script type. When I arrived in the evening, the front desk person graciously "upgraded" me to a suite, saying that's all that they had left, and that it mormaly went for $80. Oooooo. All doors open to the outside. Like I said, motel. My room was on the south/east end on the second floor. I think what made it a "suite" was the couch against the wall near the bed. The TV was decent and the wifi worked, although I had to get a sign-in at the front desk. The bathroom was tiny and the shower was just a shower, no tub. No counter, just a pedestal sink, which makes it a challenge when you're balancing a toiletry kit. The door is thin and I heard voices through it at times. The bed turned out to be more comfortable than I expected, and I awoke refreshed. When I checked out in the morning, I saw no sign of a breakfast. But later in my Long Beach stay, I had occasion to drive along another stretch of PCH and saw a different Rodeway Inn, a 5 or 6 story structure, modern and inviting, with trees around the property. A very inviting place. The Rodeway Inn where I stayed was on a hardscrabble stretch of PCH and the property itself had that hardscrabble feel, and no amount of renovations will change that. This definitely is the bottom of the barrel in terms of brand image. It's not a bad place for a quick night in a pinch, but then, I'm a pretty big guy and traveling alone. I'd stay away here if you're a single woman or a family. I'm not sure what the Rodeway corporation was thinking when they bought this property, but it's clearly not up to even their standards. Also, I have to dd that I'm not sure where the recent 5-star reviews are coming from. This is in no way, by any reasonable standard, anything close to 5 stars. Yes it's clean, yes it's comfortable, but it's also rather ramshackle, with virtually no amenities in the room or on the property. It gets 2 stars, and not 1, because of the free wifi, because the bed is comfortable, and because it seems to be free of vermin. But it cannot be reasonably rated any higher. I suspect someone's gaming the rating system, and that's a shame.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: j99999
Reviews.Content: Took a gamble, not knowing what to expect in the area. We spent three nights here in a room that was clean and freshly refurbished. Very quiet nights on a busy street. Only drawback, they advertise a breakfast, that was pretty much nonexistent. Good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “One sentence cannot sum up the perfection that is this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Changief
Reviews.Content: I had actually not planned on staying at this inn, but my reservations were somehow wiped from Harbor Inn down the street. I find myself grateful for that, as i more than likely would have had a terrible experience. This particular Rodeway Inn is run by a Mr. Patel. Though I am from Tennessee, a place where we pride ourselves on Southern Hospitality, I was amazed at the incredibly friendly and professional demeanor of Mr. Patel and his staff. I am a frequent traveler and have never had such a friendly staff cater to my needs. Always professional, always helpful. I plan on coming back to Los Angeles soon. when I do, I'll find myself right back here at Rodeway. The rooms are spotless, The amenities surpass even holiday inn's I've stayed at, The crew is efficient while not overbearing. A balance I have rarely come across in my days. The room setup is ideal for a business person who needs a small area for work, A couple who want to have a nice romantic dinner in the hotel room. I can go on about this place being nothing short of amazing, but i think there may be a character limit. To sum it up, If you plan on being in LA, and you want a very nice room for a very nice price, then this Rodeway Inn is definitely what you're looking for.

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasantly Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: 888onthego
Reviews.Content: I'm a picky, frequent traveler and I have to say, I was very pleasantly surprised with the Rodeway Inn on PCH. We got there pretty late and I was tired, hungry and a little leery about the rooms. But the manager on duty was a nice guy, who seemed very genuine, and he told us they had recently remodeled the rooms and even let us go look at it before we decided. When we got to the room, it was very clean and you could tell it was freshly remodeled. We immediately said "we'll take it". The hotel was full and it was one of their last rooms, but we got a very fair rate and the night manager even helped ensure we got to the pizza place before it closed! Bonus! I would definitely stay there again, no hesitation!

Reviews.Title: “Everything About this Place "Is Inviting"!”
Reviews.Author: SMITTENEDBYAVALON
Reviews.Content: I came to the Rodeway Inn & Suite off of PCH thinking I'll stay here; it don't look so bad. I was right. Not only can you tell that this Hotel has been remodeled it is located right on PCH where your surrounded by all the restaurants and local amenities you may be needing. The owner Patel was very nice and professional. A great display of breakfast breads with piping hot coffee ready and waiting in the Lobby brought a smile to my face. I don't think I saw one piece of trash on the ground outside anywhere. Very meticulous! Its just what I needed! :) Thank you Patel! Our room was very clean and the mini-fridge and microwave made a HUGE difference! I will definitely recommend your hotel to all my friends. You can GUARANTEE I will be back!

Reviews.Title: “One of the nicest I have seen in it's category...”
Reviews.Author: strotter925
Reviews.Content: Do not get me wrong... it goes without saying that Rodeway Inn is not a 5 star hotel. I have given a 5 star rating, because in it's class, that is exactly what it is. When you decide to stay at a Rodeway, Econo Lodge, Etc. It is always a toss up on what the shape of the room is going to be in. In this case, you get a great price, and a surprisingly great room. If you are a traveler on a budget, this location will definitely not disappoint you!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and easy location.”
Reviews.Author: Rhino76
Reviews.Content: At first glance I thought I had made a mistake booking this place but I put this down to jetlag. The outsside dosnt look great on first impressions but the room was extreamly clean and tidy which is a must, also the room was a decent size with a large flat screen TV. Patel the owner / manager couldnt be more helpful. Free newspaper, coffee and pasteries every morning which was an unexpected bonus. Considering the $60 per night cost to stay we got more than value for money. If you a looking for somewhere cheap, clean and easy access to the PCH / LAX this is for you. Oh yeah and free WiFi too.

Reviews.Title: “Cleanest hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: hthomasjhill
Reviews.Content: Although it appeared that this property underwent a recent renovation, it was by far the cleanest, tidiest and best managed lodging we've ever had the pleasure to visit. Every scrap of paper and dirt was swept from the parking lot and sidewalk daily, the rooms were well appointed and spotlessly clean and offered a modest continental breakfast as well. Thank you very much, we will be sure to return at every opportunity.

Reviews.Title: “2011 trip to California”
Reviews.Author: piericflorida
Reviews.Content: Rodeway Inn was a great place to stay. It was very clean, rooms are well maintained and comfortable. The manager will go out of his way top make your stay the best. He is also wiling to give discounts on the rooms. I highly recommend this place for a family of 4 or smaller that is going to be in the area for a short stay. The rooms only have a microwave and a small fridge so there is no cooking allowed but there are plenty of places restaurants in the area to eat ate. It is also very accessible to the I-110 and the 405. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “THE NEWLY DESIGNED HOTEL AND ITS EMPLOYEES HAVE CREATED A PLEASURABLE, WARM WELCOME ATMOSPHERE!!! THANK YOU”
Reviews.Author: sammyburchett
Reviews.Content: First of all the mgr/owner was far beyon normal courtesy. He was more than helpful. Of all the hotels and motels on pch in Harbor City, The Rodeway Inn was the best choice. The Mgr. went above the call of duty to assist my family and I in having a pleasureable and warm stay. My family and I will be back soon to stay at this hotel. This was a very important day for I have 5 children ranging from 5yrs to 17 yrs. and this was the first time ever that I would have every one of my children at the same place at the same time to meet each other for the very first time. I am so very grateful for the help and assistance I received from the Mgr. I call him "Mr. P" I just want to thank you so much for offering all that you did that day and i feel that the respect and honor you gave to myself and family should be pointed out. Once againg Thank You... Have a great day and we will see you soon.

Reviews.Title: “Nicely remodeled Very Good for price in South Bay location”
Reviews.Author: seanswell
Reviews.Content: A very nicely remodeled motel available under Choice Hotels system in the South Bay area. Newer tiled baths with comfortable beds HBO, continental breakfast in AM, LA Times delivered to room in AM. Better pricing with Choice Privileges while earing points for future stays. Best available in the South Bay area for the price, a real bargain!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean at an excellent price in a great location!!”
Reviews.Author: TNSmile
Reviews.Content: We found this location through Trip Advisor and it was everything we thought it would be. The staff was overly helpful and friendly. The hotel was extremely clean and the best price within 25 miles. Parking area was well lit and we all felt safe day or night. Each room had a clean microwave and mini fridge and the bed was very comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to anyone for any amount of time you plan to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Really Clean and Cozy Motel”
Reviews.Author: whateverfour
Reviews.Content: The staff is extremely friendly, especially Mr. Patel. Good location to walk to various neighborhood restaurants. The property was remodeled past year and it showed it.
